NewsItem.HEADLINE: RF Front Ends for Mobile Devices 2019 Forecast Update 2 (Excel File) with Research Notes (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Updated market shares, prices, smartphone shipments, and other data to update the recent trends in RF Front Ends.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The five-year forecast update reflects changes based on recnt Huawei news, new technical solutions to mm-wave, and quarterly earnings reports.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: PaMiD CFE Diversity Module PA Switch Filter RFFE Market Forecast
